documents.document: @cliff_goldsmith congratulations!!
@DarthShinobi @vadervanodin @darkinsightpod totally made from scratch. I witnessed it all 😀
@threadnz that's awesome! Where is a picture? I tried white once.... not good!
❤ that I can take pictures and he doesn't even know!! @darkinsightpod @vadervanodin https://t.co/5KOQioFS8C
@rachael_thacker aww thanks ❤ it was so lovely to meet you too!
@mysticreferee86 @jggreer no pink scarves but every model had a skinny black chiffon scarf on...
@jggreer @mysticreferee86 yes I did use it in a fashion show and it was awesome! I love the whole soundtrack
I would really really love to go to Hollywood. Think really good thoughts and maybe I'll win a trip https://t.co/4lp6iZWD27
@cliff_goldsmith @jggreer @darkinsightpod @Vadervanodin I love listening to you guys and picking out funny quotes! Very entertaining
@jggreer @darkinsightpod haha nice try! I'd be worried if I mistook your voice for @vadervanodin
@jggreer @darkinsightpod @vadervanodin haha it was definitely you Jeremy! That's what makes it so funny. I'll bet you don't even remember it
@jggreer quote from the most recent @darkinsightpod episode "you just end up grinding through a bunch of dudes" 😂😂😂 https://t.co/ZlFlWWeW25
@MorbidBeard I most definitely do! Incredibly supportive and multi talented plus so much more @vadervanodin
@vadervanodin you're the best hubby!!!
The 7yr old complaining he can't undo the knot in his laces. The 4yr old comes along and picks up the shoe and undoes the knot Kids.
Meet The Most Comfortable Trousers Ever - #nzgirlhacks https://t.co/eyNqCHMXIU #nzgirl #comfortablychic
Aria left her dolly at Oma's house and her uncle has been having fun scaring people - got this Snapchat from my mum https://t.co/AvIVf3pruE
My bed has been taken over! I ask my daughter when I'm going to sleep and apparently on daddy's side @vadervanodin https://t.co/niZjWfszhM
listening to @darkinsightpod @jggreer tim tam slam!! I have been looking forward to hearing this!
@jggreer I'm part of a fashion show soon and I am actually considering using that as my soundtrack...
@darkinsightpod @jggreer love the soundtrack for alone with you! Stunning! Thanks for putting some on the podcast.
@vadervanodin @jggreer It was when discussing about Youtube and what you can't monetise anymore ie no videos with swearing or politics...
@jggreer joking about my kid being a swearing little Trump supporter.... so glad its a joke and totally not true!
Catching up on @darkinsightpod and am listening to episode 29 about the Grinder comment. So glad you boys enjoy my cheeky sense of humour!
@threadnz oh thanks Megan! I've been using hootsuite and I think something has gone wrong. Thanks for letting me know :-)
Feeling like such an old lady hobbling around Chch thanks to very sore feet! #imnotanoldlady
At the airport again, hopefully I haven't forgotten anything 😬 off to Chch for 2 days
Forgetting your bag at the airport and getting the runaround can only be fixed with a custard and chocolate donut https://t.co/6yWy0bFDte
It has taken me 2 days to recover from fashion week! Here is what happened to me on day one of #NZFW16 https://t.co/6yWy0bFDte
@threadnz haha that is such a good line!
@WardrobeFlair @NZFashionWk some how I didn't see you at all 🙁 we must have been at different shows. Hopefully I'll see you today
@threadnz @NZFashionWk I think that's my phone in the background 😉 happily sitting next to the food.
@vadervanodin haha you seem to be alone on that opinion 😉
my sisters flatmates are confused because she is at work but they could hear her talking. It was me. We really do sound alike #samevoice
@threadnz very good to know :-) my daughter loves her caterpillar but I hadn't worked out the whole washing part yet
@threadnz I would love to know the answer as we have one of these caterpillars too
@threadnz that is a very cool playhouse!
Make your clothes last! Here are 5 easy tips for lengthening the life of your clothing https://t.co/LuZLdpZvfm #fashion #tips
Who else loves team photos? We have fun with ours at our campaign photo shoot https://t.co/aEQoLOqXus #teampic https://t.co/t54eVSeqYC
Important banking meeting and my hubby spots that I am wearing kids socks covered in cat pics. I'm just super glad the bank guy didn't see!
Am I an egg? My hubby said I am but decide for yourself and have a laugh at the same time https://t.co/rEcnNJQ14c #comedyfashion #bts #style
I read some of my next blog post out to my hubby @vadervanodin and he says I'm an egg. Love you too hubby ;-) #egg #blogpost #fashionblog
Who else has been bit by a deer???? If you've been to Nara Park in Japan then chances are you have... https://t.co/w9VsE6HWZX
Not all clothing you see on the runway makes it into the store. Every wondered why? https://t.co/QusowG5U1j
How much do you really know about fashion and what you are wearing?? 3 fashion documentaries you should see https://t.co/aVclN3UYod
@TheLoreHunter @vadervanodin @jggreer okay now I'm worried that Walmart might actually sell babies and I'll be in trouble for slander...
@TheLoreHunter it is also called human trafficking depending on the situation.... ie if you're buying from Walmart 😜
@vadervanodin oh sorry, didn't mean to misquote you hubby..... but it is funnier to say you said they sell babies :-p
@TheLoreHunter "this fall I am acquiring a condo and another child" @jggreer" you can't buy babies" @vadervanodin "walmart sells babies"
@vadervanodin @jggreer @darkinsightpod I didn't say you weren't cool, just I am cooler :-p only by a little bit
@jggreer @vadervanodin yup i'm listening and I totally appreciate Desiree specific jokes :-) :-) makes my day!
haha @jggreer thanks! I am way cooler than @vadervanodin :-P and yea, you're in my good books! @darkinsightpod you guys crack me up :-)
@jggreer don't worry, you've got me to remind you of all the funny stuff you say 😉
@jggreer I was laughing at the tinder/grindr comment and you saying not to send you a mean tweet. Now I'm laughing at the daddy long legs!
@jggreer hahaha I just got to the end of the episode!! I promise this is not a mean tweet ;-) Can't. stop. laughing. !!!
@jggreer well you being the worst is just super funny!!! sorry @DE4TH_NOTE
Have you considered joining the EU? I hear there is an opening. (dagger to @DE4TH_NOTE courtesy of @jggreer via @darkinsightpod ) #Brexit
So we didn't win the #etsyawards but it was still amazing to be a finalist and a fun ride https://t.co/jLx213aPGy #awardfinalist #designcomp
Seeing our clothing in articles and blogs never gets old! #fashionpr #newspaper #inprint #fashion https://t.co/JOiLpOVX8q
@DE4TH_NOTE it's not fair they make a decision like that for the coming generations. Not at all sure what benefit they see in it????
@WardrobeFlair I would totally cry too! It does not sound like a fun experience
@DE4TH_NOTE that is awful! It seems so unfair for brexit it to go ahead with only 51% especially with what a huge change it will be 🙁
#Transparency in the #fashionindustry is a hot topic so we are writing about people involved in our business https://t.co/2gb27qFKjz #ethics
@jggreer that looks so fun. I'm a Jane Austen fan so if you enjoyed then I'm sure I would too
@jggreer the #janeausten board game you mentioned sounds like fun!! #marrymrdarcy haha what a name.
can't imagine how you're feeling this week @DE4TH_NOTE after hearing you talk about #Brexit I'm praying you're wrong about the politicians
Love that the #islandbaycycleway is being discussed on @darkinsightpod Glad to know you guys thinks its stupid as well!! #fixthecycleway
Every time we drive past Marthas Pantry in Wgtn, my daughter yells out "mummy mummy, thats where we went for tea!" https://t.co/WchlqcBqpl
Ever wondered why sometimes you will see a pic of clothing from a label and never find it available for purchase? https://t.co/pEVidyJnZa
@thedownlowe I feel your pain. I went to park in britomart the other day but couldn't believe the cost! Ridiculously expensive
@Revatar thanks for knowing my name because of the french teacher story ;-) @darkinsightpod #frenchteacherwhocantspeakfrench
love listening to @darkinsightpod @vadervanodin and @Revatar discussing kids playing #darksouls and what their mums will let them play ;-)
@jggreer @darkinsightpod @vadervanodin that's what made it so funny! Especially since you kept saying Meccas 😉
@DE4TH_NOTE haha!!! offering your nuts up to a game developer on a podcast!! oh I hope your wife listens :-p @darkinsightpod
is that actually a lightning storm or have you got explosive diarrhoea?? @jggreer what a quick and witty response @vadervanodin too funny!
totally love that the latest episode of @darkinsightpod is called Maccas! and the artwork my hubby @vadervanodin did is super cool :-)
@tryshoelace no I haven't even looked at apps yet. Do you have any recommendations?
@tryshoelace thanks :) I've only switched to shopify recently but it has been really great
